name: Santa Escape!
description:
Santa Escape! - A Roguelite Christmas Dungeon Crawler

In order for Santa to deliver the Christmas miracle, he must harness the power of thousands of elves. But the elves are not friendly. Quite the opposite! In order to keep Christmas going, Santa must go to the elf grotto: and get out alive!

Features:

Procedurally-Generated levels: No two plays are the same!

Roguelite progression: Use the elves you obtain each run to research new abilities!

Original Soundtrack: With added jingle bells.

Made for the Secret Santa Jam 2020, as a gift for UARTMan. 

Models created using MagicaVoxel and Animated with Blender. Made with Unity,
